attributes.action: Stop the listing of Mobile Phone Numbers on a directory that can be used by any person to retreive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mobile Numbers should only be given to people that I want to have it, not any Tom, Dick or Harry, this is an invasion of my privacy and what about data protection.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
